trans-unit.source: Sets the quality level that will be used for JPEG screen captures

seg-source.mrk: Sets the quality level that will be used for JPEG screen captures

target.mrk: Sets the quality level that will be used for JPEG screen captures

trans-unit.source: The quality level of the image. Must be in the range of 0 to 100.

seg-source.mrk: The quality level of the image.
Must be in the range of 0 to 100.

target.mrk: The quality level of the image.
Must be in the range of 0 to 100.

trans-unit.source: If not explicitly set, JPEG screen captures default to a quality level of 100

seg-source.mrk: If not explicitly set, JPEG screen captures default to a quality level of 100

target.mrk: If not explicitly set, JPEG screen captures default to a quality level of 100
